mdRecord.dcterms:title: Life, letters and travels of Father Pierre-Jean de Smet, S. J., 1801-1873: missionary labors and adventures among the wild tribes of the North American Indians / edited from the original unpublished manuscript journals and letter books and from his printed works, with historical, geographical, ethnological and other notes; also a life of Father de Smet .. by Hiram Martin Chittenden .. and Alfred Talbot Richardson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chittenden, Hiram Martin, 1858-1917
Richardson, Alfred Talbot
Smet, Pierre-Jean de, 1801-1873
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 4 v. fronts., plates, ports., fold. map in pocket, facsims. 25 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Paged continuously; v. 1: xv, 402 p.; v. 2: vii, 403-794 p.; v. 3: vi, 795-1211 p.; v. 4: vi, 1213-1624 p.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Indians of North America
West (U.S.)--Description and travel.
Northwestern States--Description and travel.
Northwest, Canadian--Description and travel.
